mdRecord.dcterms:title: Lt. Vincent E. Eanes, October 26th, 1972
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Two photographs taped together at the back, the top photograph shows a group of men on the Salem Fire Department Ladder Truck Two, and the bottom photograph is of Lt. Vincent E. Eanes posing with the instruments on the side of the same fire truck, both photographs dated for October 26, 1972
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
